forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day greets you with a forecast that speaks to a gentle embrace of warmth amid the cool coastal breeze. Above, the sky reveals itself as mostly sunny, hinting at a shimmering brightness that will carry the high of 65, but as the afternoon shadows stretch, a subtle descent to 63 will remind you of the ever-present oceanic chill. The west-southwest wind dances lightly, whispering through the streets at 7 to 18 mph, with gusts that might playfully tousle your hair.

Tonight, as the sun dips below the horizon, the city will settle into a blanket of mostly cloudy skies, the low resting around a comfortable 55. The wind, persistent yet gentle, will pick up a notch, adding a sense of movement to a night designed for cozy endeavors. Dress thoughtfully for the day—light layers will serve you best, a breezy shirt paired with a light jacket to fend off the cooling twilight. As you journey through the city, a stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the lesser-known local cafes will allow you to bask in the understated charm that this vibrant area offers. 

The overall impression is one of clarity softened by the hints of a marine layer that may linger in the afternoon, neither completely obscuring the iconic landmarks nor allowing their beauty to shine in full splendor. The conditions invite you to engage with the essence of the city, to savor a moment of calm reflection amidst the lively backdrop of urban life.
